attributes.action: We want to know why the goverment is allowing this country's gas and electricity consumers to be ripped off by allowing the gas producing company,s to sell off the gas reserves in the summer . This is all because we in this country are allowing our natural resourse of gas , which has never beeen so important to our economy !!!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "we demand that the goverment builds enough storage facilities to store the gas reserves that we accumulate in the summer and warmer months!" , This goverment is allowing european rivals to buy our summer excess of gas production  . So instead of spending billions on nuclear power WE NEED THE GOVERMENT TO BUILD OR FORCE THE GAS COMPANY,S TO BUILD STORAGE FACILITIES THAT WILL STOP US FROM BEING RIPPED OF AS CUSTOMERS !!!!. But the goverment makes more money from tax this way don,t they ???????!!!!!!! . The  european countries have storage facilities to hold upto 20% of their annual needs but the uk can only store  a massive 5% , who do you think is mainly to blame for this farce , the goverment and the gas / fuel companies . remember this ;  centrica,s survey is saying that at best case the gas and electricity prices WILL RISE BY A MIN 18%  TO A WORSE CASE 46%  BY THE END OF THE YEAR .LETS ACT NOW SIGN THIS PETITION AND START TO MAKE A GOVERMENT OF WHAT  THE PEOPLE  ELECTED DO WHAT WE WANT AN THAT WILL BENIFIT US, NOT THEM AS BECAUSE IF THINGS GET ABIT TIGHT IN MP,S HOMES THEY WILL VOTE THEMSELVES ANOTHER 25% PAY RISE . WHO ARE THE FOOLS IF WE DO NOT ACT NOW !!!
